Reviews.Title: Acer Timeline U Sucks
Reviews.Author: Naveen
Reviews.Content: Hello People,I got this acer timelineU few months back and I am feeling bad for every penny I spent on this shit. The keyboard really sucks. How can someone even come out with such a poor product??. I am technical guy working and believe me there are many other good products out there which you people can put your money on. I will not recommend this product to anyone. Just wanted to make sure no one else gets cheated like me. This product is not worth the single star which I have given here but was not able to skip that. I urge Amazon to provide an option to give thumbs down to such products.
